# How to setup Chat?

## Configuring Chat for enhanced team communication

### üí¨ Chat Features 101:

Upon starting your journey with Delightree, you will find that your account already includes a selection of pre-existing chat channels.

- **Announcements -** This channel is where all users, no matter their permission level, can come together to share brand-wide updates, announcements, and more.
- **All Owners -** This channel is for both Franchisees and Franchisors.Franchisees, hop on board to collaborate and toast to victories. Franchisors, utilize this channel for seamless communication, sharing of resources, and much more.
- **Inner Circle -** This exclusive channel is dedicated to the corporate team. HQ, feel free to use this space for discussing top-secret plans to expand to over 100 locations in a year, or for any other purpose you see fit.

### ![Screenshot 2024-03-27 at 9.25.55 AM](https://8332146.fs1.hubspotusercontent-na1.net/hub/8332146/hubfs/Screenshot%202024-03-27%20at%209.25.55%20AM.png?width=543&height=369&name=Screenshot%202024-03-27%20at%209.25.55%20AM.png)

### üë• Creating new Groups or Channels

Creating new groups or channels is easy, simply click 'Add', title your chat, and add members!

**Difference between Group and Channel?** Two's a crowd group and three's a party channel üéâ

### üó£Ô∏è Effective Ways to use Chat

We have optimized chat features to make them user-friendly and enjoyable.

üëâ Easily share files, photos, videos, and links from your device. (and your favorite emojis üòú)

üöß Establish channels tailored for specific initiatives such as marketing campaigns, menu enhancements, or staying in touch with your latest vendor.

**Reminder:** Superadmins have the ability to adjust visibility settings for all content on Delightree, including chat. For further assistance, feel free to reach out to your Customer Success Manager for more information.

###### Was this article helpful?    YesNo
